---

<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## drop() function

返回给定 iterable 除前 `length` 个元素外的所有元素。

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function drop<A>(
  length: number,
  iterable: Iterable<A>,
): IterableIterator<A>;
```

## Example

```ts
const iter = drop(2, [1, 2, 3, 4]);
iter.next(); // {done:false, value: 3}
iter.next(); // {done:false, value: 4}
iter.next(); // {done:true, value: undefined}

// with pipe
pipe([1, 2, 3, 4], drop(2), toArray); // [3, 4]

await pipe(Promise.resolve([1, 2, 3, 4]), drop(2), toArray); // [3, 4]

// with toAsync
await pipe(
  [
    Promise.resolve(1),
    Promise.resolve(2),
    Promise.resolve(3),
    Promise.resolve(4),
  ],
  toAsync,
  drop(2),
  toArray,
); // [3, 4]
```

[Try It](https://codesandbox.io/s/fxts-drop-2t0h0)

see [pipe](https://fxts.dev/docs/pipe)<!-- -->, [toAsync](https://fxts.dev/docs/toAsync)<!-- -->, [toArray](https://fxts.dev/docs/toArray)

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/Lazy/drop.ts)
